description: An HTML document implementing a web-based database viewer interface with embedded CSS and JavaScript for dynamic data loading and interaction.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from API and populates sidebar menu.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refresh button handler to reload database list.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database's table list and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders table data into HTML table element.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects.
